name: Build The City
description:
Simple click game where the goal is to raise population as days go by. Beware of random disasters that may happen during gameplay and destory your progess.

This project was created in 5 days period during Unity education at PISMO Novska 

Programer: Bernarda Špoljarić

Art: Bernarda Špoljarić

Mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski

Update 1.1

- Add Exit Game Button

- Add Start Game Panel

- Fixed crashing bug
